quote: Focus on the give. Figure out what you can give to someone today that will change their life, even just a little bit.
why_clipworthy: It highlights a shift from transactional thinking to relationship building, which is crucial for long-term success.
suggested_hook: Want to transform your real estate business? Start by focusing on the give.

quote: Use the 'accusation audit' to prepare clients for bad news, softening the emotional impact.
why_clipworthy: Provides a specific technique for managing difficult client conversations.
suggested_hook: How to deliver bad news to clients without damaging your relationship.
